title: Lag Spikes going from 7ms to 200ms for about 3 seconds.
body:
Normally i'm completely stable but over the past 24 hours I've noticed some frequent spikes.. its not server breaking but it can be annoying at certain moments.

here is my speed.

Telstra is my provider

replies.body: I've found an identical issue, my download and upload speeds are both reasonable and yet I get frequent latency spikes. This issue arouse a few months ago, went away all on its own and returned a few weeks ago. Seems suspicious given the 'net neutrality' business in the US and the rise of NBN.
